QueryText: SOFT ROT AND RHIZOME ROT IN GINGER
KCCAns:
MANCOZEB @ 3GM/L OF WATER BEFORE PLANTING
 AND MATALAXYL @ 0.1 % AS PRE MONSOON  TREATMENT..

QueryText: Management of shoot borer in ginger
KCCAns: I suggested him to spray Dimethoate 30 EC @ 2 ml per litre of water
